entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Deerwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -29.0°C

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
